loans.name: Aristides

texts.es: Aristides se destaca como un señor responsable muy reconocido en la zona, toda su vida se ha dedicado a las actividades del campo como es la Ganadería y la Agricultura, su esposa es ama de casa, sus hijos estudian carreras técnicas impartidas por INTA una Institución del Estado sobre hortalizas y manejo y cuido del Ganado, y en tiempos libres ponen en práctica lo aprendido por su padres y estudios.  En años anteriores don Arístides sufrió pérdidas monetarias por la baja en el precio del Ganado, lo que la ha costado recuperarse.  Actualmente tiene la necesidad de comprar Insumos para siembra de Maíz y Trigo por lo que solicita crédito para comprar Gramófono, Sipermetrina, Glifosato, Herbicidas y otros  fertilizantes para la siembra, así aprovechar el potencial suelo.
texts.en: Aristides stands out as a responsible man who is very well known in the area. All of his life, he has worked in the country in activities such as cattle ranching and agriculture. His wife is a housewife. His children are in technical school in INTA, a state institution, where they study mostly about produce, and the care and management of cattle. In their free time, they put what they have learned from their classes and their parents into practice. In previous years, Arístides suffered financial losses sue to the low price of cattle, and it has been hard to recover. Now he needs to buy materials to plant corn and wheat. That is why he is asking for a loan to buy gramaxone, cypermethrin, glyposate, herbicide and other fertilizers for planting. This way, he will take advantage of the soil's potential.

loans.use: materials to plant corn.

loans.name: Sitora

texts.en:
Sitora is 24 years old. She is a very hardworking and responsible woman. Sitora is bringing up a little son alone because she is divorced. 

Sitora is going to start a sewing business to earn for living. She is a good sewer. Sitora learned to sew national women dresses in her parents' house. Now, she is glad that she can sew women's clothes. She has taken a rental building for her workshop. Now she needs a sewing machine and fabrics. 

Sitora is asking for a loan of 4,000 TJS to buy a sewing machine and fabrics for organizing her new business. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for organizing her new business.

loans.name: Sarom

texts.en:
Sarom is 47 years old and a married woman with four children. One of her children is married and three are single. 

Sarom works on her own farmland located in Prey Chhor, Kampong Cham, on which she primarily grows rice as a subsistence crop. She has been doing this, with support from her husband, for more than 20 years.

Thanks to Hattha Kaksekar's new water loan program with a special rate, Sarom is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, safeguarding her family's health and protecting the environment. She will use the loan she's applying for to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank to improve her household sanitation practices for the sake of her family.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank to improve her household sanitation practices for the sake of her family.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Elsie works hard to support her family.

She has a jeepney transport business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from general store. 

 Elsie is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance for her jeepney transport business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested additional loan to further build her business.

Elsie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her jeepney.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to remodel rental cabins.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Hello world! Meet Peter, a mixed farmer in Kisii, which is a rural town in Kenya. For the last 16 years, this father of four has been selling milk and tea leaves to earn his family a decent living. 

Today, Peter is seeking a loan to purchase a dairy cow. The purpose of the purchase is to increase his milk output. "There is a high milk demand in my village. Families are relying on the milk I produce, and I am afraid my supply cannot meet the demand," he stated.
 
Peter's biggest challenges are raising capital and finding affordable labour. He already has two dairy cows on his farm named Osamo and Nyabarati. The third cow will help use pasture he has already prepared.
 
Peter plans on using the extra income from milk sales to pay the loan. After fully repaying the loan, the extra income will go to paying school fees.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards. She is requesting a new loan to purchase fruits and sugar for her business. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and sugar for her juice-making business

loans.name: Binti

texts.en:
Binti is a married mother of four adult children. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. 

Binti has operated a cashew nut selling business at the market for the past twenty years, selling to passersby and neighbours. She cited seasonality as her major challenge in the business.

With the loan, she wants to purchase sacks of cashew nuts for resale. She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of cashew nuts for resale.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit lives in Kapan town with her 22-year-old daughter, Lusine. Anahit is involved in a retail business. She chose the purchase and sale of clothing as it is a profitable business in Kapan town. 

To enlarge her stock of clothing and to meet her customers' needs, Anahit applied for this loan. She has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

Please help Anahit to enlarge her retail business and gather more income for her family.

loans.use: to pay for new stock of clothing for reselling to customers

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is a 44-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. He resides in Karachi, Pakistan and is a father of five children. He has been doing his own business of cattle farming for the past 20 years. This is the only source of income to fulfill the needs of his entire family.

Saeed wants to buy cattle feed in bulk, but he is unable to do so because he has insufficient financial resources. Therefore, he has applied for a Kiva loan from BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan he will purchase feed for his cattle and fulfill the needs of his business. Saeed is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for this financial support.

loans.use: To buy cattle feed

loans.name: Mustafa

texts.en:
Mustafa is a 29-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. He resides in Karachi, Pakistan. He has been running his own small enterprise for many years providing sewing services for men's shirts. This is the only source of income for his family.

Mustafa needs to buy a new sewing machine and cloth in bulk. Due to financial constraints, he is unable to buy these items that will fulfill his business needs. Therefore, he has applied for a Kiva loan from field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan he will purchase these items for his business so that he can earn more profitable income. Mustafa is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for this financial support.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine and cloth in bulk

loans.name: Haydee Marilu

texts.es: Haydee de 40 años de edad, habita en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos pero ellos ya trabajan y ayudan económicamente en el hogar. Haydee se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a ese trabajo  razón por la cual ya es muy conocida en la zona y los clientes la prefieren por brindar un buen servicio y sobre todo higiene y buenos precios en sus tortillas. Ella es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora cada día se pregunta cómo puede mejorar sus ingresos para poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar maíz por quintales y cal. Tiene mucha Fe que tendrá éxito con la decisión tomada y sus condiciones de vida poco a poco se irán mejorando.
texts.en:
Haydee, 40, lives in her own house with her husband and children. Her children are already working and contribute financially to the household. Haydee makes a living selling tortillas. She has been in this business for many years, so she is well-known in her area and her clients prefer her because she offers a good, clean service and good prices. She is a fighting, enterprising woman who asks herself every day how she can improve her income to give her family a better quality of life. 

She decided to apply for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy quintals of maize and lime powder. She has faith that she will be successful with this decision and that her living conditions will improve little by little.

loans.use: to buy quintals of maize and lime powder.

loans.name: Candida Rosa

texts.es: Candida de 63 años de edad vive con sus tres  hijos en casa propia, ella tiene un puesto de comida cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Es una mujer luchadora que su empeño es dar lo mejor de si misma, para que a su familia no le falte lo necesario para la subsistencia. Cuenta con la satisfacción de tener clientela fija ya que esta ubicado en un lugar muy transitado. La cliente desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar mesas, sillas, mas materia prima arroz, pollos, carne, frijoles, fruta, verduras, etc. para variar su menú y tener un poco de mas entrada económicamente, pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y poder comprar lo dicho y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Candida, 63, lives with her three children in her own house. She has had a food stall close to her home for several years. With the earnings from her sales, she manages to cover her household expenses. She is a fighting woman who works hard to give the best of herself so that her family does not lack for anything. She has the satisfaction of having a fixed clientele because her stall is located in a very busy area.

Candida would like to expand her stall by buying tables, chairs, and more ingredients such as rice, chicken, meat, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc. She will then be able to vary her menu and have higher earnings. She does not have the necessary capital to make this investment, so she decided to apply for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy the aforementioned items. She will then earn a higher income to have greater financial stability.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, and ingredients such as rice, chicken, meat, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is 23 years old, married and a mother of one child. Her husband provides additional income. 

She owns a barber shop and beauty salon and has been running the business for eight years now. 

She would like a loan of KES 30,000 through which she will buy modern shaving machines for her barber shop. She currently makes an estimated monthly income of KES 109,500.

She will use her anticipated profits to buy a tailoring machine. In future, her hope is that she will buy more machines for her salon and barber shop to make her work easier.

loans.use: to buy more shaving machines.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
As a married parent of 11 children, Lolita works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from pig fattening.  

Lolita is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell like soap, milk, canned goods, eggs, etc. for her general store business.

Lolita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She successfully paid back her previous loans and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell like soap, milk, canned goods, eggs, etc

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Annabelle is 40 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from selling pre-paid mobile loads. 

Annabelle requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, soft drinks, soap, etc. Annabelle has borrowed and paid four loans from NWTF before this loan.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, soft drinks, soap, etc.

loans.name: Binti

texts.en:
This is Binti. Her previous loan was a big help to her business. She was able to buy more items for her cafe. She has been in this business for years now, and it continues to grow.
She would like to apply for a loan to purchase more food ingredients such as onions, tomatoes, rice, and maize flour for her business. She looks forward to this financial help with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to purchase more food ingredients such as onions, tomatoes, rice, and maize flour for her business.

loans.name: Mira

texts.en:
Mira is 32 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Mira requested a PHP 28,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, spices, coffee, etc.

Mira has borrowed and paid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. 

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, spices, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy water by the sack and some coconut.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is a married woman with three children, one of whom attends school. She lives in her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.
For the past four years, she has operated a retail shop, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned seasonality and theft as her major challenges. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.
With the loan, she wants to purchase soap, wheat flour, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase soap, wheat flour, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking  oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, and seeds.

loans.name: Connie

texts.en:
Connie, a widow with two children who both go to school, is a third-time borrower with UGAFODE microfinance, having paid her previous loans well. 

She is a poultry farmer who rears layers to sustain her life and take care of her family. She hopes the loan of five million UGX will help her to book chicks to restock the poultry farm since the current stock is tending to off layers. She is optimistic that with the loan she will be able to save on the cost of transportation. She is hardworking.

She’s grateful to funders, especially for helping widows who are working hard to better the lives of their families. Her future plan is to take her children through school successfully, for this was the dream of her late husband, and also to build a house for them to call home.

loans.use: To buy poultry feed and baby chicks.

loans.name: Víctor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor tiene 30 años de edad, pertenecía a una familia de muy escasos recursos y con mucho esfuerzo lograron que pudiese cursar hasta un 6º grado, ya que sus padres no podían darle el estudio a todos sus hijos, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos tiene 3 hijos,  uno de ellos está estudiando un primer grado y los dos menores no están estudiando. 

Desde muy pequeño su padre le inculcó al trabajo en la tierra al cultivo de maíz y otros cultivos, hoy en día se dedica a trabajar unas 16 tareas de maíz, todos los días en la época de invierno tiene que madrugar para poder dirigirse al lugar donde tiene las tierras cultivadas, también pudo aprender el trabajo de albañil, esto lo aprendió de un amigo que le dio la oportunidad como ayudante; luego a través del tiempo le fueron dando oportunidades para que fuese aprendiendo este tipo de trabajo, hoy en día tiene mas experiencia y trabaja por su cuenta como albañil esto lo hace siempre y cuando haya una oportunidad de trabajo.

Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados en la compra de fertilizantes, abonos y en la preparación de la tierra para el cultivo de maíz.

Los sueños a futuro para su familia es darle el estudio a sus hijos para que tengan una mejor oportunidad en lo laboral, terminar de construir su vivienda ya que es bastante pequeña y su familia va creciendo, y a futuro espera comprar un terreno para trabajar la agricultura en lo propio, ya que tiene que rentar para cultivar.
texts.en:
Víctor is 30 years old. He grew up in a family that was low income and with a lot of effort they were able to send him to school through the 6th grade. His parents were unable to give all of their children an education. His spouse is a housewife and they have children. One of them is in first grade and the youngest ones aren't in school. 

Since he was very young, his father taught him how to work the land, growing corn and other crops. Today he works 7,000 square meters of corn. Every day in the winter he has to get up very early to go to the place where he has his crops. He was also able to learn about bricklaying from a friend and that friend gave him a chance to be an assistant. Over time, they were given chances to learn about that type of work. Today he has more experience and he works on his own as a bricklayer. He does this as long as there is work.  

The loan funds will be used to buy fertilizers and to prepare the soil for planting corn.

His dreams for the future for his family are to give his children an education so that they will have better work opportunities, finishing construction on his home, because it is very small and his family is growing, and buying his own land because he has to rent to plant.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to to prepare the soil for growing corn.

loans.name: Chanchala Self Help Group-2

texts.en:
The Chanchala Self-Help Group consists of four members from a small Nandakumarpur village of West Bengal, India. Mani Rani (hand raised) leads this group. Mani Rani grows and sells betel leaves. She also works in the fields to help her husband so as to provide a better life for her two children. Mani Rani is friendly, hardworking, reliable and an experienced farmer. Community people and other farmers take her advice and trust her during their times of need. Mani Rani's harvest last year was good, but she hopes she can have an even better one with the support of the local NGO Sabuj Sangha and the other farmers in her group.

Mani Rani will use her Kiva loan portion for betel vine farm preparation, which includes buying wood, bamboo, straw, fertilizer, labor and saplings. The other three members need loans for paddy cultivation and to buy tools for a carpentry shop.

Mani Rani and her group members thank Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: to buy wood, bamboo, straw, fertilizer, labor and saplings for her betel vine farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticide, fertilizer, manure, herbicide, etc. and to improve her land.

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es: Feliciano se dedica a la venta de productos químicos como por ejemplo fertilizantes y semillas, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar más fertilizantes, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Feliciano sells chemical products such as fertilizers and seeds. He is very responsible and for that reason he was invited to participate in the communal bank "Llapallanchis Llankasunchis". He is asking for a loan at this time to buy more fertilizer. He is thankful and appreciative of this loan and he is committed to cover his monthly installments as a priority.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for her daughter's studies.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan.
She has restarted her business and has been in with NWTF since 2013. She is now requesting a PHP 5,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor so she can build a house for her family.
With your help, Marites will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner, rather than later.
In the future, Marites would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to rebuild her home.

loans.name: Julio Alberto

texts.es:
Julio tiene 55 años de edad, perteneció a una familia de muy escasos recursos económicos y siendo el mayor de sus hermanos tenía que tomar la rienda con el padre de ellos; pero con mucho esfuerzo de parte de él y su familia logró cursar hasta un quinto grado, después se le puso mas difícil ya que la familia empezó a aumentar y su padre siendo una persona adulta ya se le hacia mas difícil. Julio se vio obligado a dejar los estudios y luego se acompaño y formó su propia familia pero no olvidando a sus padres y la necesidad que a ellos se le presentaba.

En la época de verano se dedica al cuido de su ganado (vacas) también  a la quiebra de piedra ya que vive cerca de una cantera de piedra y trabaja quebrándola para poder hacerle mas fácil el transporte a las personas que llegar a comprar este producto, tiene que madrugar desde las cuatro de la mañana para que cuando salga el sol si es posible ya haber terminado, ya que se pone con mucha temperatura en ese lugar, en la época de invierno se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura esto lo hace si es posible hasta la mediodía ya que también cuida sus vaquitas las cuales le están proporcionando leche.

Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados en la preparación y alquiler de la tierra agrícola también en la compra de fertilizantes, abonos y la semilla de siembra.

El Sueño a futuro es la compra de dos a tres vacas lecheras, ya que ve que es una buena fuente de ingreso para él y para fu familia.
texts.en:
Julio, 55, comes from a family of very limited financial resources. As the oldest of his siblings, he had to take the lead with their father. With his effort, as well as that of his family, he managed to study until the fifth grade. Afterwards, it became more difficult as the family started to grow and his father was older. Julio was obligated to stop studying. Later, he entered a relationship and started his own family, but he never forgot his parents and their needs.

During the summer, he makes a living raising livestock (cows) as well as breaking stones. He lives near a stone quarry and he breaks the stones to make it easier for buyers to transport the stone. He has to wake up at 4:00am so that he can be finished by sunrise, if possible. It gets very hot in this area. During the winter, he works on the farm until midday. He also takes care of his milk cows.

He will use this loan to prepare and rent farmland. He will also buy fertilizer, manure, and seeds. His dream in the long term is to buy two to three milk cows, as he sees this as a good source of income for himself and his family.

loans.use: to prepare and rent farmland, as well as to buy fertilizer, manure, and seeds.

loans.name: Chetana Self Help Group-2

texts.en:
Sabita is one of the members of Chetana Self-Help Group, which consists of three women hailing from a rural place called Nandakumarpur village, West Bengal. All the women work as a team and have worked together on different community projects. The group assigned Sabita as the comptroller of Chetana Group.

Sabita is a very hardworking woman who is committed to her community. She is 40 years old, married, and the mother of two sons. Her elder son is studying engineering while the younger one is in 10th grade. Sabita grows and sells betel leaves.

Sabita will invest her loan in betel vine farm preparation, which includes buying wood, bamboo, straw, fertilizer, labor and saplings. The earnings generated by this work are the only source of income for her family. This first loan from Kiva will be a big help for her family; it will allow her to strengthen her business so that she can continue to support the education of her children. 

The other two members need a loan for tailoring and vegetable farming.

loans.use: to buy wood, bamboo, straw, fertilizer, labor and saplings for her betel vine farm preparation.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 29-year-old married man from Gaza city. For the past five years, Mahmoud has been working in his barber shop. It is a very good business, and he has his loyal clients. Mahmoud would like to improve his business and expand it. 

Mahmoud took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a steam machine for his salon. By taking this loan, Mahmoud will be able to improve his business and expand it. 

Mahmoud appears in the photo in his barber shop

loans.use: to buy a steam machine for his salon

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 27 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de naranjas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, ella trabaja muy duro para que a su familia no le falte el sustento diario, su esposo también ayuda en el hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de sacos de naranja por mayor ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y si podrá darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación algún.
texts.en:
The client is 27 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their two children. 

She sells oranges. Her business is located in her home. She works very hard so that her family does not lack daily sustenance. 

Her husband also helps with the house. 

She is requesting a loan to buy bags of oranges at wholesale.  

This is her only source of income and in this way can give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy bags of oranges at wholesale.

loans.name: Delmy Yanet

texts.es: Delmy de 40 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, ella comercializa  en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, Delmy es una mujer dedicada a su labor, luchadora siempre dispuesta a trabajar duro para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aprovechar el auge de su negocio para aumentar la producción y así poder tener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc. ella tiene buenas referencias de pago y está segura que podrá saldar su deuda a tiempo, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Delmy, 40, lives with her life partner and their children. She works in agriculture, specifically growing corn. 

She has worked as a farmer for many years and has valuable experience which allows her to grow the best crops. She sells them to all neighboring areas and has a large steady clientele. 

These people always prefer her products since the quality and price is very accessible. 

Delmy is dedicated to her job, she is always fighting to work hard to succeed. She wants to take advantage to increase her production and in this way increase her income. 

She needs to invest in supplies but needs the capital and for this reason is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL. This will allow her to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools etc. 

She has good references and is sure she will be able to pay off the loan in time and at the same time she is confident that she can give her family the life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools etc.

loans.name: Edith Rocio

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL, él banco eta ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia  tiene 46 años de edad y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en una empresa privada de transporte interprovincial, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de un carro.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the communal bank SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL. The bank is located in Cusco. 

She is 46 years old and is married. The partner alternates her daily activities by working for a private inter-provincial transportation company. 

She has worked at this job for a long time and things are going well for her thanks to the commitment she puts in every day. 

She is a responsible person knowing that this is how she will get her family ahead. 

She is requesting a loan to get maintenance done on a car. 

She is thankful for the loan given and is dedicated to pay the established payments.

loans.use: to get maintenance done on a car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a ceramic floor, cement, and sand, as well as to pay workers.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta de 39 años de edad se dedica desde hace 4 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y maicillo, y esa así como se gana la vida honradamente, con su trabajo logra solventar cualquier gasto que se le presente en su hogar, Marta vive con su grupo familiar conformado por su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella quiere seguir con sus siembras ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo pero no tiene de suficiente capital para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito y poder comprar los insumos necesarios como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas y también mejorar el terreno donde hace su siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía y asi poder seguirle dando a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Marta, 39, has been working in agriculture for four years. She plants corn and sorghum, earning a living honestly. With her work, she manages to cover all of her household expenses. Marta lives with her husband and two children. 

She wants to continue growing crops, as this is her only source of income. However, she does not have the necessary capital to do so. Therefore, she has applied for a loan to buy necessary supplies, such as fertilizer, manure, pest control, and herbicide. She will also improve the land where she plants her crops, shown in the photo. She will then be able to continue giving her family everything they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, pest control, and herbicide, as well as to improve her land.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: Ernesto de 53 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 5 años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maiz y maicillo,  comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive con su esposa y su suegra, Ernesto esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes asi como muestra la fotografía y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en: Ernesto is 53 years old. He's been a farmer for 5 years, which allowed him to earn the skills and knowledge needed to attend to his crops. His main crops are corn and sorghum. He sells his produce in basic staple foods stores nearby his home. He uses his earning to support his family. He lives with his wife and mother-in-law. Ernesto is requesting for this loan to buy agricultural inputs to plant crops such as compost, seeds, fertilizers, such as the one shown in the picture, to generate more income and cover all of his family's needs without any hardship.

loans.use: to purchase compost, seeds, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Maria Elena  se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, pan, gaseosas, cerveza, aceite y otras cosas más, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de azúcar, sacos de arroz y otras cosas más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Maria Elena sells staple foods such as rice, sugar, pasta, bread, soda, beer, oil and others. She is very responsible, and for that, she was invited to participate in the community bank "Llapallanchis Llankasunchis". At this time, she is asking for a loan to buy sacks of sugar, bags of rice and other items. She appreciates and values this loan and she is committed to pay her monthly installments on time.

loans.use: to buy sacks of sugar, bags of rice and other items

loans.name: Neli

texts.es: Neli se dedica elaboración de textiles como por ejemplo chompas, chalinas, mantas y otras cosas más, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar lana, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Neli earns a living by making textiles, such as sweaters, scarves, and blankets, among many others. She is a responsible person, which is why she was invited to participate in the "Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” communal bank. She needs this loan to buy wool. She is grateful for this loan and values this opportunity. She promises to comply with the payment of her monthly installments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Medarda

texts.en:
Medarda is 50 years old and married with two children. 

Medarda and her family survived Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Medarda is taking out a housing loan amounting to 7,900 PHP (Philippines pesos) to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Medarda has been an NWTF borrower since 2012.

With your help, Medarda can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of Super Typhoon Haiyan. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family after Super Typhoon Haiyan

loans.name: Placida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL, él banco eta ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia Placida tiene 40 años de edad, tiene 02 hijos  y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en una empresa privada de transporte interprovincial, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, a la vez la socia quiere empezar un negocio propio de venta de comida, la socia espera que le vaya bien en el futuro, la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como arroz, aceite entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to THE SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL community bank. The bank is located in Cusco.
 
Placida is 40, has two children and lives with her partner. She works for a private inter-provincial transportation company. 

She has been working at this job for some time and it is going well for her thanks to the commitment she gives her job every day. 

She wants to start her own business selling food. She hopes it will go well for her in the future. She is a responsible person as this is the way she gets her family ahead. 

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as rice, oil etc. 

She is thankful for the loan given and is committed to the payment plan.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as rice, oil etc.

loans.name: The Women´s Bank Of Dorcas Group

texts.es:
Doña Ofelia tiene 66 años de edad, es madre soltera de 4 hijos, todos mayores de edad, los cuales solo dos de ellas dependen en parte de la actividad productiva que ella realiza. Doña Ofelia es artesana de la zona, muy conocida por los trabajos tan originales que realiza, asegura que esto es un don que le ha permitido explotar de una buena manera ya que sus clientas son fieles a lo que ella realiza porque es un producto muy bien elaborados y de calidad. Ella sola confecciona estos artículos en el corredor de su casa, aproximadamente tarda un día completo, dependiendo del diseño que le soliciten. También es importante recalcar que ella imparte cursos de artesanía para las mujeres de la comunidad que deseen tener un ingreso propio, gracias a lo que realicen, como en el caso de doña Ofelia que le ha permitido brindar una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
Eligió Fundación Mujer porque tiene muchos años de trabajar con ellos y le ha ido muy bien ya que responde correctamente a los pagos que debe realizar mensualmente, hasta que logra cancelar su deuda por completo. 
Ella espera que un futuro su nieta continué confeccionando lo que ella también le esta enseñando, para que esta herencia y habilidad continué en la familia.
texts.en:
Ofelia is 66 years old, the single mother of 4 children, all adults now, just 2 of whom still depend on the productive activity she carries out. Ofelia is an artisan of the zone, very well known for the very original work she does. She sees this as is a gift that she has been able to exploit in a good way. Her customers are faithful to her production because these items are well-designed and of quality.

Ofelia makes the articles in the corridor of her house, requiring approximately one complete day to finish each one, depending upon the design solicited. Also, it is important to recall that she offers courses in artisan crafts for women of the community who wish to have their own income from their work. In Ofelia's case, it has permitted her to provide a better condition of life for her family.

She has selected the Women's Foundation for this loan because of her many years working with them, which have gone very well. Ofelia has been very responsible in making her monthly payments, completely paying off her debts.

Ofelia hopes that in the future, her granddaughter will continue to produce what she is teaching her to, so that this inheritance and ability will continue in the family.

loans.use: to buy primary materials to be able to make cushions, bags,  purses, and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Hello, world! Meet Anna, a mother of two who is practicing agriculture in Kisii, which neighbors Maasai land. For eight years, her primary sources of income have been milk, eggs, tea and vegetables from her farm. She engages in other small businesses to make more money. 

Anna is seeking a loan to purchase a dairy cow. She wants to expand her asset base and ensure financial security for her children. Her biggest challenge is that of other farmers and Kisii's poor roads. This makes it hard and expensive for farmers to transport their produce to the market. 

Today, she is struggling to pay her children's school fees. With your loan, Anna will generate enough income after repaying the loan to comfortably secure good education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Jair Alexis

texts.es: Jair es un humilde hombre de 31 años de edad el cual tiene un feliz matrimonio del cual nació un hermoso hijo que a la luz del día tiene 6 años. Jair se desempeña como minero y añadido a esto realiza ventas pro catalogo como cremas de manos, perfumes, accesorios y vende ropa de hombre y mujer con el único propósito de terminar de construir su casa propia su gran sueño y anhelación, no solo tiene este sueño quiere tener un gran almacén con empleados de su trabajo ya que nadie mejor que ellos saben lo difícil que es trabajar en una mina y a los peligros que están expuestos, solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido en promoción y variedad de ropa para seguir adquiriendo ingresos y utilidades para darle fin al proyecto de casa propia y encarrilarse a su otra obsesión su almacén propio para alejarse de la minería
texts.en:
Jair is a humble 31-year-old man who is in a happy marriage with one beautiful son, age 6. Jair works as a miner. He also sells products from a catalog, such as hand cream, perfume, accessories, and men's and women's clothing. His only goal is to finish building his own house, which is his great dream. This is not his only dream -- he also wants to own a big store along with his work colleagues. No one knows better than they do how difficult and dangerous it is to work in a mine. 

He is applying for a loan to buy sale merchandise and a variety of clothing to continue earning an income, so that he can finish his project of building his house. He will then start up with his other current obsession, that of owning his own store to get away from the mines.

loans.use: to buy catalog products on sale, such as perfume, hand cream, face care products, and a variety of clothing in order to generate an income to finish building his house.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Mujeres De Negocio Group

texts.es: Doña María Isabel, tiene 57 años de edad, es una soltera, madre jefa de hogar que gracias a su actividad productiva de comerciante; ha logrado salir adelante con sus hijas y una nieta. Ella ofrece todo tipo de ropa, zapatos, perfumes y bisutería que compra en diferentes almacenes desde hace tres años que inicio con su actividad productiva, su nieta que esta en el colegio es la que le ayuda ofreciendo la mercadería a sus profesoras y compañeras. Este crédito ella lo solicita para comprar nueva mercadería para la época. Eligió Fundación Mujer porque ya ha trabajado con ellos y por la buena atención. En un futuro ella desea que su nieta continué con la venta de estos productos y montar una tienda en su casa.
texts.en:
Doña María Isabel is 57 years old. She is a single mother and the head of her household, thanks to her productive sales business. She has managed to provide for her daughters and a granddaughter. Since she started her business three years ago, she has been offering all kinds of clothing, shoes, perfumes, and costume jewelry, which she buys from different suppliers. Her granddaughter, who is a student, helps her by offering the merchandise for sale to her teachers and fellow students. 

She is requesting this loan to buy new merchandise for the season. She chose Fundación Mujer because she had already worked with them and for their good service. In the future, she would like her granddaughter to continue selling these products and she would like to set up a shop in her house.

loans.use: to buy the merchandise that her customers are asking for

loans.name: Natela

texts.en:
Natela is a 27-year-old married woman from the village of Kokhta, Tsalka district. She lives with her husband and three school-aged sons. Natela and her husband are involved in an agricultural activity. Particularly, they cultivate a plot of agricultural land, growing potatoes they use for local trading. For covering her family's increased needs, Natela has engaged in cattle breeding also. 

As it becomes harder to earn a living over time, Natela wants to expand her agribusiness in order to more effectively meet the daily costs of her family. A loan of 3,000 GEL (Georgia lari) will be a great support to this hard-working woman and her family, enabling her to start a trading business in cheese. She will purchase stock of cheese at low prices and will sell it at an increased price to the wider market; particularly, she will take away products to the capital of Georgia. 

Natela and her family rely on the goodwill of the lenders and will highly appreciate their support.

loans.use: To start a trading business in cheese

loans.name: Abida's Group

texts.en:
Abida is a 30-year-old woman who lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her three children. Her husband has been working in a public sector organization for many years and he is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the family. Abida provides sewing services and earns an income to contribute along with her husband to manage the household. 

She needs different kinds of goods like needles, threads, pieces of cloth, and machine oil for her business purpose, but due to insufficient financial means, she is unable to purchase these accessories.  Abida is the group leader and other one  is the group member for this loan. Abida has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her to purchase these above-mentioned accessories and help her to increase her monthly sales and profit by providing better sewing services.

Abida is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To purchase accessories like  needles, threads, pieces of cloth, and machine oil

loans.name: Iqbal

texts.en: Iqbal is a 49-year-old, active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with his spouse. By profession he is a retailer with a bakery shop that is the only source of income to fulfill all of his needs. Iqbal wants to purchase different types of eatable items e.g. biscuits, Nimko, cold drinks and juices for reselling purposes. But, due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to purchase these items to fulfill the demands of his walking customers. Therefore, he has applied for a Kiva loan from BRAC Pakistan, so that he can purchase the above-mentioned items for his retail business and earn a more profitable income. For this financial support, Iqbal is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy different types of eatable items for his retail bakery shop.

loans.name: Iqbal

texts.en:
Iqbal is a 51-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, residing in Sialkot, Pakistan. He is a guardian of his family and responsible for managing the entire household. He has three children. Iqbal owns a general store where he sells a variety of consumer items and other accessories.

Iqbal needs to buy different types of inventories of consumer goods and other items. Due to some financial constraints, he is unable to buy these items for his business. Therefore, Iqbal has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan he can easily purchase the items mentioned above to fulfill his business needs so that he can earn more income and expand the size of his business.

Iqbal is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy different types of general consumer items for resale

loans.name: Ahmed

texts.en:
Ahmed is a 48-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, residing in Sialkot, Pakistan, with his spouse and three children. By profession he is a retailer of hardware and he has been in this business for the past ten years. He is solely responsible for managing the entire household.

Ahmed needs to purchase different types of hardware accessories and tools for reselling purposes, but due to some financial constraints he is unable to buy these accessories and tools. Therefore, he has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan amount he will purchase the above mentioned accessories to fulfill his business needs so that he can earn more profitable income.

Ahmed is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy different types of tools and hardware for reselling purposes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more wigs for her business.

loans.name: Deepabali Self Help Group-2

texts.en:
Gita is a married woman, 36 years old, who lives in a remote village in West Bengal, India. She is the featured member of Deepabali Self Help Group, pictured with her hand raised. She lives with her family of three, including her husband and a son. Her son is studying in 3rd grade. She is very energetic, hardworking, and enthusiastic and always devotes her time to getting her family ahead. 

Gita breeds fish for her livelihood. Initially she started her business with a low budget. She gained a little profit. Now there is good demand for fish, so she plans to expand her business, which will help her increase her monthly income. With this loan from Kiva, she will purchase manure, raw materials, food for fishes, etc.

Gita thanks the lenders for their support and generosity towards her and the group.

loans.use: to purchase manure, raw materials, and food for fishes

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 35-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. He lives in Sialkot, Pakistan, with his spouse and one child. He is a retailer of crockery by profession and has been doing his business for past ten years. He is a guardian of his family and responsible for managing the entire household.

Ali needs to buy different types of crockery for reselling purposes but due to insufficient financial resources he is unable to buy these merchandises for his business purpose. 

Therefore he has applied for a Kiva loan from BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan amount he will easily purchase crockery to fulfill his business needs so that he can earn maximum profitable income.

For this financial support Ali is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy different types of crockery for reselling purposes.

loans.name: Vilma Elizabeth

texts.es: Vilma de 34 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pupusas su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación y adicional a eso también tiene un taller de costura, con lo que obtiene de sus dos trabajos y con la ayuda de su esposo han salido adelante con los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo unos cuartos para sus dos hijos pero con lo que obtiene no le alcanza para poder realizarlo, por esa razón se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un préstamo y así poder comprar arena, cemento, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra y poder hacerle los cuartos a su hijos para que puedan vivir más cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: Vilma is 34 years old and makes a living making and selling "pupusas" (thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or re-fried beans). She runs this business out of her home, and also has a dressmaking workshop. With the money that she earns from her two jobs, and with the help of her husband, Vilma is able to cover household costs. Vilma and her husband own the house where they live with their two children. Vilma wants to make improvements to her home, by adding more bedrooms for her children. The money that she earns, however, is not enough to carry out this work and so Vilma has come to "Apoyo Integral" to apply for a loan in order to buy sand, cement, bricks and iron, and to pay labourers. She can then build the rooms for her children so that they may live in a safer and more comfortable environment.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, bricks and iron, and to pay labourers.

loans.name: Maria Cleofes

texts.es: Maria de 46 años de edad es una mujer muy trabajadora, responsable y honrada, desde hace 25 años ella se dedica a la agricultura siembra cada año maíz y frijol, y esos años le han dado la experiencia necesaria para cosechar un buen cultivo, muchos vecinos dan buenas referencias de su persona y de los productos que comercializa por esa razón posee mucha clientela,  ella vive en casa propia con su esposo en casa propia, su hijo vive en estados unidos y le ayuda económicamente, Maria esta solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios como: semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc., y al mismo tiempo mejorar el terreno donde realiza su siembra que es el que muestra en la fotografía y así ella y su esposo puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: María is 46 years old and is a very hard-working, responsible and honest woman. For 25 years she has made a living growing corn and beans. Over the years she has gained the necessary experience in order to have a good harvest.  Many of María's neighbours give good character references for her and recommend her products. For this reason, she has many customers. María lives in a house that she owns with her husband. The couple's son lives in the United States, and helps them financially. María is applying for this loan from "Apoyo Integral" in order to buy necessary farming supplies, such as seeds, fertilisers, weed-killers and more. At the same time María also wants to improve the land where she sows her crops (shown in the photograph). With this loan María and her husband can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilisers, weed-kills and more, and to prepare her land.

loans.name: Toribia Berta

texts.es: Toribia es profesora en uno de los colegios de la ciudad de Paucartambo pues es una excelente profesora,  ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para la educación de sus hijos y para mantenimiento de la casa, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Toribia is a teacher in one of the schools in the city of Paucartambo. She is an excellent teacher. 

She is a responsible person and for this reason she was invited to become a member in the “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” communal bank. 

At this time she is requesting a loan for the education of her children and for house maintenance. 

She is thankful and values the loan and is committed to paying the monthly amount responsibly.

loans.use: with the education of her children and house maintenance.

loans.name: Yeni Roxana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL, él banco eta ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia  Yeni Roxana tiene 29 años de edad tiene 01 hijo y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en una empresa privada de transporte interprovincial, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para pagar los estudios de su hijo.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to THE SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL communal bank. The bank is located in Cusco
The partner, Yeni Roxana, is 29 years old and has one son. She is single. 

She works for a private inter-provincial transportation company. 

She has worked at this job for a long time and things are going well for her thanks to the commitment she puts in every day.

She is a responsible person knowing that this is how she will get her family ahead.

She is requesting a loan to pay for her son's studies. 

She is thankful for the loan given and is dedicated to pay the established payments.

loans.use: to pay for her son's studies.

loans.name: Mwanajaa

texts.en:
Mwanajaa is a married and has five children who attend school. Her children are the motivation for her hard work. She owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. 

Mwanajaa operates a cafe business, preparing items like, rice, tea, beans, and chapati (flat bread) to sell to passersby and neighbours. She cites seasonality as a major challenge.

With the loan, she wants to purchase food ingredients such as cooking oil, onions, and tomatoes for her business. She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase food ingredients such as cooking oil,onions, and tomatoes for her business.

loans.name: Zuhra

texts.en: Zuhra is a 48-year-old energetic woman. She has been doing business tailoring for many years. She stitches for the people in her community and uses the income to support her entire family. She also knows the art of embroidery. She has attained a good number of customers. Currently she applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR.  She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of thread in different colors, along with the packs of lace, zippers, and buttons to create a means of increasing revenue. She hopes to generate a healthier source of income. She is in her 4th loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors, along with the packs of lace, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Balqees

texts.en: Balqees is a 55-year-old married woman. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her own business four years ago by opening a general store. She offers a variety of grocery items at reasonable prices and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. To fully stock her store, she requested a loan for 40,000 PKR. She will use the loan to buy packs of rice, sugar, biscuits, and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Balqees wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy packs of rice, sugar, biscuits, and flour.

loans.name: Shailabala

texts.en:
Shailabala is 39 years old and she lives in Madhusudanchawk village, West Bengal. She is married and has four children. Her family consists of her husband and a son along with three daughters who are all married.  Shailabala works hard to manage their day to day expenses. She runs a fast food shop in her locality where she sells different types of fries, snacks, etc…  Her store is adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbours, students, and workers from the local community.
 
To continue operating her business, Shailabala is requesting loan of INR 15,000. She belongs to “Karunamoyee” Self-Help Group (SHG) which is managed by the local NGO “Sabuj Sangha”.  She will be using the loan to buy raw ingredients which are used in preparing the snacks. She is expecting a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Shailabala dreams of having a bigger stall which will help sustain her family.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients to prepare snacks

loans.name: Juana Veronica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL, él banco eta ubicado en el departamento de Cusco.
La socia  Juana Verónica tiene 29 años de edad tiene 01 hijo y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de transporte interprovincial, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar llantas para su carro.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Juana belongs to the "SEÑOR DE HUANCA-TERMINAL" communal bank which is located in the Department of Cusco. Juana is 29 years old, is married and has one child. She alternates her daily activities with her inter-provincial transportation business. She has been running this business for quite some time and things are going well for her thanks to the dedication she brings to her work every day. Juana is a responsible person and this is the way she gets her family ahead. She is requesting this loan to buy tires for her car. She is grateful for the loan and promises to pay her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy tires for her car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for repairing cars.

loans.name: Nibedita Self Help Group-2

texts.en:
Alpana runs a small medical store in Nandakumarpur village, West Bengal. Her shop is well maintained and very clean. The customers are enchanted by the friendliness and humbleness with which Alpana attends to them. Alpana is married and has a son and a daughter. Both son and daughter are studying for their B.A., 1st and 2nd year respectively. Though in her forties, Alpana is very energetic, hard-working, and disciplined. A few years ago she opened her store and with passing years she has advanced, building her financial stability. Her husband and children help Alpana in her business.

Alpana is requesting a loan to increase her working capital to buy more medicines for her medical store. She is very grateful to the lenders with whose help she will be able to expand her inventory and increase her monthly income. One of her dreams is to continually expand her business to assure a peaceful and secure future. Alpana wants to save enough for her children’s education.

Alpana is a member of “Nibedita” Self Help Group. The other member from this group is Susheela who needs loan to improve her stationery shop.

loans.use: to buy more medicines for her medical store

loans.name: Kalakunr Dairy Samuha Self-Help Group

texts.en:
A group of five women from the small village of Kalhakund in Jharkhand, formed “Kalakunr Dairy Samuha” Self-Help Group (SHG). Gudia (hand raised) is the leader of “Kalakunr Dairy Samuha”. She is 30 years old, married, living with her husband, a daughter, and a son. Gudia sells milk from the four cows she has and has been in this business for the last six years. Her net income is Rs. 300 per day. Her husband is also helping in her in this business. 

Gudia now wants to purchase one more cow for which she is requesting a loan as there is high demand for milk so that she is able to supply the growing demand of the customers in the market. Gudia hopes the loan will help her increase their income, which will help her purchase the needed study materials for her children's education and pay their school fees.

All the members of this group are grateful to Kiva and its lenders for this help and support.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es: Santusa se dedica a la venta de caldo y comida, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo papas, verduras, fideos y carnes, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Santusa sells soups and meals. She is a responsible person and for this reason she was invited to join the “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” communal bank. At this time she needs a loan to buy supplies such as potatoes, vegetables, pasta and meats. She is grateful and appreciates the loan and promises to pay her installments with great responsibility.

loans.use: to buy supplies like potatoes, vegetables, pasta and meats.

loans.name: Feroza

texts.en:
Feroza is a 47-year-old married woman. She has three children: two daughters and a spouse. She is striving hard to support them, which includes providing food and health care. Her husband is employed in a small factory, but his income is not sufficient to meet the family's daily expenditures. 

Feroza started her business sewing clothes to contribute to the family income, and she is well familiar with stitching techniques. She has requested a loan to buy stocks of thread, cloth, buttons and needles. With this stock, she would be able to meet the demands of her customers without fail. 

She hopes to grow her business and dreams of providing a better standard of living for her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of sewing materials

loans.name: Tiburcio

texts.es:
Tiburcio vive, junto a su esposa y 4 hijos, en una alejada comunidad del Norte de Nicaragua. Inició en la agricultura trabajando con bovinos y producción de granos básicos. Debido a la pequeña extensión de su finca decidió dedicarse a la caficultura porque es un rubro con más potencial económico. Su pequeña finca es de 2.82 hectáreas y la maneja bajo los criterios de Comercio Justo.
Actualmente, este pequeño productor está solicitando un crédito que le permita garantizar la compra de fertilizantes y abonos para el mantenimiento de 0.7 hectárea de café, a fin de asegurar una buena producción en este ciclo. El sueño de Tiburcio es lograr que sus hijos puedan llegar a formarse como profesionales y tengan mejores oportunidades para su desarrollo personal y profesional, el amor al trabajo y su anhelo de cumplir este sueño es lo que motiva cada día a este pequeño productor para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Tiburcio lives with his wife and 4 children in a small isolated community in the north of Nicaragua. He started working in agriculture with cattle and growing basic grains. Because of the limited size of his farm he decided to grow coffee as this product has more economic potential. His small farm is 2.82 hectares and he farms it according to Free Trade standards.

Currently this small producer is requesting a loan which will permit him to buy manure and fertilizer to maintain 0,7 hectares of coffee in order to ensure a good harvest this season. Tiburcio's dream is to see his children become professionals and have better opportunities to develop both personally and professionally. His love of his work and his desire to fulfill his dream is what motivates this small producer to progress every day.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es: Sabina es profesora en uno de los colegios de la ciudad de Paucartambo pues es una excelente profesora,  ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para la educación de sus hijos y gastos de alimentación, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Sabina is a school teacher in the city of Paucartambo. She is an excellent, responsible educator. For that reason, she was invited to participate in the communal bank "Llapallanchis Llankasunchis" and at this time, she is asking for a loan to cover school and food costs for her children. She appreciates and values ​​this loan and agrees to comply with payment of her monthly installments with great responsibility.

loans.use: to cover school and food costs for her children

loans.name: Mario Edgardo

texts.es: Mario de 40 años de edad es un hombre muy trabajador, responsable, honesto y humilde, con gran esfuerzo hace 20 años empezó a trabajar en la agricultura sembrando maíz y frijol, hoy ha tenido buenos resultados ya que obtiene una buena cosecha que comercializa en los alrededores de la zona, posee mucha clientela pues sus productos son de muy buena calidad y lo vende a buen precio, Mario vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, el esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar los insumos necesarios para la siembra como lo son: abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas, controles de plagas, etc. y también mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografía y así poder seguir con sus siembras y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mario is a very hardworking, responsible, honest and humble 40 year old man.

With a lot of effort, he has worked in agriculture for 20 years, planting corn and beans. Now, he has had good results, as he makes a good crop which he sells in the outskirts of the region.

He has a lot of customers, as his products are very good quality and he sells them at a good price.

Mario lives with his family group in his own house. 

He is asking INTEGRAL for a loan, through which he can buy the inputs necessary for planting, such as: compost, fertilizers, herbicides, pesticides, etc. and also improve the land, which is shown in the photo.

In this way, he will be able to continue his plantings and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy composts, fertilizers, herbicides, pesticides, etc. and also to improve the land.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es: Julian de 32 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene 15 años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el rubro, es muy conocido en la zona y ya tiene buena clientela pues obtiene las mejores cosechas, por lo tanto comercia producto de primera calidad y a precios muy accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable, Julian se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad, es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que aprovechar las oportunidades lo llevaran un paso más adelante del éxito; en la última siembra no obtuvo las ganancias esperadas y esta vez quiere aumentar la producción, pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. así como muestra la fotografía. Julian tiene referencias de tener una moral intachable, responsable y de muy buena paga, confía que podrá responder a la deuda y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Julian is 32. He lives with his life partner and their two children. He's been a farmer for 15 years cultivating corn and beans. He has a lot of experience in the industry and he's very well known in the area. He has a great customer base thanks to his quality products and affordable prices. His services are beyond compare. Julian is characterized by his kindness; he's an entrepreneur eager to get ahead. He intends to take any opportunity to step further into success. He didn't achieve his expected earning from his last harvest, so he wants to increase production, but he needs some capital. So, he reached out to 'INTEGRAL' for a loan, that will allow him to buy seeds, fertilizers, pest control, etc. as the picture shows. Julian has an untarnished references, he is responsible and he always pays on time, he is confident he will be able to cover this debt and at the same time provide his family with a plentiful living.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: Martina se dedica a la venta de comida, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo verduras, fideos y carne, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Martina earns her living selling food. 

She is a responsible person, and was invited to participate in the “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” community bank because of this.

This time, she needs a loan to buy inputs, such as vegetables, noodles and meat.

She appreciates and values the loan and promises to comply with her monthly payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to purchase inputs such as vegetables, noodles and meat.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
Andres de 56 años de edad, esta casado y tiene cuatro hijos y solo dos viven con él y estan estudiando, los otros dos hijos  ya se casaron pero siempre le ayudan con la siembra del maiz. Con mucho esfuerzo logro sacar adelante a su familia, tiene veinticinco años de dedicarse al oficio de albañileria es muy reconocido por su trabajos de contrucción y por eso las personas lo contratan se sienten satisfechas por su trabajo. En la epoca lluviosa aprovecha de hacer siembras de maiz, maicillo y frijoles para los gastos del hogar y para la venta,  Andres no solo vende maiz sino tambien lo vende en elote.
El credito lo necesita para comprar insumos agricolas como sulfato de amonio, herbicidas y otros materiales que ya se han desgastado por el uso como bomba, machete y macanas. Ademas de eso tiene que pagar la mano de obra de las personas que aparte de sus hijos le colaboran en la siembra.
texts.en:
Andres is 56 years old. He is married and has four chidlren; only two live with him and are in school. The other two children have already married, but they still help him with the corn farming. With great effort, he has managed to support his family. For 25 years, he has worked in the construction trade; he is very well known for his construction work, so people hire him and feel satisfied with his work. He takes advantage of the rainy season to do his corn, sorghum, and bean plantings for household consumption and for sale. Andres doesn't only sell corn as grain, but also on the cob.

He needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies like ammonium sulfate, herbicides, and other materials that have been worn out from use, like a pump, a machete, and dibbles. In addition to that, he has to pay for the labor of people other than his children who help him with the planting.

loans.use: to buy ammonium sulfate, herbicides, and other materials that have been worn out from use, such as a pump, a machete, and dibbles. In addition  to that, he has to pay for the labor of people besides his children who help with the planting.

loans.name: José Silvio

texts.es:
José de 48 años de edad,  de su primer matrimonio tubo cuatro hijos a quienes a pesar de no vivir juntos con ellos no los desampara y siempre esta pendiente de que nada les falte. Ahora vive con su nueva pareja y tienen un hijo.

José cuando estaba bien joven estubo dos años en el cuartel, luego emigro dos años al extranjero pero no le gusto vivir lejos de su familia se regreso a El Salvador y actualmente se dedica a la agricultura desde hace treinta años.
El crédito lo ocupara para la compra de insumos agricolas como abono para la planta que ya crecio, herbicidas para evitar la plaga. Su sueño es remodelar la casa
texts.en: José is 48 years old. He has 4 children from his first marriage who despite them not living with him  José has not abandoned them and he is always making sure they have everything they need. Now he lives with his new wife and they have one child. José spent two years in jail when he was very young and then he lived abroad for two years. But he didn't like living far away from his family so he returned to El Salvador and has been farming for 30 years. He will use the loan to buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer to make the plants grow and herbicides to avoid infestations. His dream is to remodel his house.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Zarina

texts.en:
Zarina, 53, is a responsible mother. She lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. This is her sixth loan with BRAC and her first with Kiva. 

Her husband owns a scrap shop and deals in scrap iron, aluminum, plastic bottles, etc. He purchases scrap goods from common people and sells it to recycling factories. But nowadays, due to household expenses, he has no money to buy scrap goods and no scrap to sell to earn money. Therefore, Zarina has requested a loan for her husband to buy scrap goods, establish his enterprise and save to meet sudden needs or incidents. 

Zarina is very impressed with this honorable support and shows her wish to take out more loans after paying this one. She thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy scrap goods for reselling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, to improve the soil for his crops.

loans.name: Angel Fernando

texts.es:
Angel es un hombre emprendedor que vive en Camaná. Tiene 2 hijos que son su mayor orgullo y a quienes ha sacado adelante gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación.

Se dedica a la actividad agrícola hace algún tiempo, cultivando diversos productos de la más alta calidad. También posee un pequeño negocio de Venta de Libros con el cual solventa algunos gastos familiares.
Sin duda alguna Angel es un hombre luchador que quiere cumplir uno de sus más grandes sueños: “Ampliar su negocio de venta de libros”.

Es por eso que está eternamente agradecido a los prestamistas de Kiva, ya que con ese apoyo el podrá comprar insumos para realizar un mantenimiento de sus cultivos y obtener mayores ingresos con la venta y así poner en marcha la ampliación de su proyecto.
“Gracias Kiva”.
texts.en:
Angel is an entrepreneur who lives in Camana. He has 2 children who are his biggest pride and who have succeeded in life thanks to his effort and dedication. 
He's been a farmer for some time, cultivating various products of the highest quality. He also owns a small business selling books, that helps him cover some family expenses. Without a doubt, Angel is a fighter who wants to fulfill one of his greatest dreams: "Expanding his business of selling books." 
For that reason, he will be forever grateful to Kiva, because their support helped him purchase inputs for maintenance of his crops that translated into a greater income, that will ultimate help him start expanding his project. 
"Thanks Kiva".

loans.use: to buy supplies to maintain his land,

loans.name: Ada
